content: mark that previous chain 1/double_crochet sec9on as the second corner round 27 single_crochet in chain space *chain 3 skip single_crochet single_crochet in chain space* to corner chain 3 single_crochet in same chain space for corner repeat from * to * around to beginning corner single_crochet chain 1 double_crochet in beginning single_crochet turn move corner markers up as you go round 28 repeat round 27 round 29 chain 5 counts as half_double_crochet chain 3 single_crochet in same chain space *chain 3 skip single_crochet single_crochet in chain space* to marked corner chain 3 half_double_crochet chain 3 half_double_crochet chain 3 single_crochet 1 diagram of shoulder increases in marked corner move marker to space between 2 half_double_crochet repeat from * to * to marked end corner chain 3 half_double_crochet chain 1 double_crochet in 2nd chain of tch in marked corner move marker to space between 2 half_double_crochet turn rounds 30-38 repeat rounds 27-29 round 39 in this round you add an increase in both the 1st and 3rd chain sps created in the two corners of the previous round single_crochet in chain space chain 3 skip half_double_crochet single_crochet chain 3 single_crochet in chain space mark as corner *chain 3 skip single_crochet single_crochet in chain space* to chain space before next marked corner chain 3 single_crochet in same chain space for first corner of shoulder move marker here chain 3 skip st single_crochet in next chain space twice chain 3 single_crochet in same chain space for second corner of shoulder repeat from * to * to chain space before end chain 3 single_crochet in same chain space for final corner chain 1 double_crochet in beg single_crochet turn each of four shoulder corners should get a marker the game sweater pa-ern by denise ogier please do not reproduce 2 left shoulder split 3 diagram of le4 shoulder split 2 completed le4 shoulder split row 40 before star9ng note you are star9ng on one side of the center single_crochet of the shoulder you will work around and stop on the corresponding space on the other side leaving the center chain space unworked move the corner markers up as you go single_crochet in chain space ^*chain 3 skip single_crochet single_crochet in chain space* repeat from * to * to next corner chain 3 single_crochet in same chain space for corner repeat from ^ over next 3 corners repeat from * to * to end end with chain 1 double_crochet in beginning single_crochet turn row 41 repeat row 40 row 42 *chain 3 skip single_crochet single_crochet in chain space* to the last corner chain space before the split mirroring the other end of this short side of the shoulder chain 1 skip 1 chain of the chain space and double_crochet into the 2nd middle chain of the chain space turn mark single_crochet at corners of split as the 4 corners of the shoulders the game sweater pa-ern by denise ogier please do not reproduce 3 stripes 4 stripe pa ern diagram for the le4 shoulder the
